install.name: Events Calendar
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: Displays a calendar with days that have events linked. Requires events component.

param.name: show_nav_prev_month
param.label: Display previous month navigation
param.description: Display a link for the previous month

param.name: start_day
param.label: Start day
param.description: The day (number) the calendar should start on

param.name: display_last_month
param.label: Display last month
param.description: Display the calendar for the previous month

param.name: show_nav_next_month
param.label: Display next month navigation
param.description: Display a link for the next month

param.name: display_next_month
param.label: Display next month
param.description: Display the calendar for the next month

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
